title: Adele's 'secret wedding' to Simon Konecki was an 'intimate affair in LA - though Robbie Williams was invited'
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Adele sent the entertainment world into meltdown when she appeared to confirm at the Grammys that she'd married Simon Konecki . 
But it would seem that the Hello hit-maker would have been able to keep her marital status firmly underwraps had she not let it slip, as her wedding was very much an "intimate affair". 
According to Heat , the 28-year-old chart-topper tied the knot with her boyfriend of five years just after Christmas in front of a small selection of "family and close-friends". Keeping it in a low-key? (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
The magazine states the London-born singer, who stormed the Grammys earlier this month with five wins, held the ceremony at her Â£10million mansion in Los Angeles to avoid a "fuss". 
"It was an intimate affair with just close family and friends," An insider told the magazine. "Her manager, Jonathan Dickins, was there, as well as her mum, Penny, and Simon's ten-year-old daughter Victoria." 
The couple reportedly held the ceremony at home to keep it "under wraps"; with Adele and Simon allegedly doing away with any faff, choosing to simply exchange their vows. Adele and Simon Konecki are said to have tied the knot in an "intimate" ceremony in December (Photo: Recording Academy/ Grammys /Youtube) 
"Adele didn't want any fuss or to go to church. She just didn't want to deal with all the hoopla of a big do and risk people finding out about it," the insider explained. 
"The ceremony itself was something they knew they wanted, but they'd been putting off for a long time." 
And it seems even though they were keen to keep the ceremony firmly under-the-radar, the couple were still keen to have some of their A-List friends there to witness the special day. An inside told heat magazine the singer didn't want a "fuss" (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Robbie Williams and his wife, Ayda Field, were one couple on the invite list, according to the insider. 
But despite the insistence of keeping the ceremony under wraps, it seems that Adele still had one thing any bride dreams of, her white wedding gown. 
Mirror Celeb has reached out to a representative of Adele for comment on the matter. Rumours surrounding her reported marriage reached fever-pitch at the Grammys (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
Rumours first started to surface that the couple had tied the knot when the Rolling In The Deep singer was seen sporting a gold band on her ring finger in Beverly Hills, in December. 
And after weeks of speculation regarding the couple's relationship status, she appeared to confirm that they had indeed tied the knot as she gave an emotional speech at the Grammys thanking her "husband'" for his support. 
The couple - who have been an item for five years - have one child together, four-year-old Angelo . Like us on Facebook
